## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registermcreginfo">RegisterMCRegInfo</a> - Helper template for registering a target register info implementation.

This invokes the static &quot;Create&quot; method on the class to actually do the construction. Usage:

extern &quot;C&quot; void LLVMInitializeFooTarget() &#123; extern <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> TheFooTarget; RegisterMCRegInfo&lt;FooMCRegInfo&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X(TheFooTarget)</a>; &#125;

Definition at line 1181 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/targetregistry-h">TargetRegistry.h</a>.
